text:
Hello All!! 
Want to ask the community a question -- see if you have had similar experiences
and if you have found a solution -- 
Over the last few months - three to four - one of our guys has come to us about
Java/Tomcat failing to run properly after the monthly cumulative updates. 
After much testing, and months of trying (hoping it was one of those
undocumented flaw), we have narrowed it done to simply resetting the JRE_HOME
system variable [to the exact same entry, it is] and rebooting a few times
afterwards solves the problem. 
Now that really shouldn't be a solution, maybe to Microsoft it is, but has
anyone come across this weird scenario? - and if so, what solution has worked
out for you? 
Cheers,
Tomas 
--
%40googlegroups.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Cumulative Updates & System Environment Variables
metadata.email_text_original:
